query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `mistake_notebook_questions` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `studentId` int NOT NULL,
  `subject` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `topic` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `difficulty` enum('easy', 'medium', 'hard') NOT NULL,
  `source` varchar(255),
  `questionText` text NOT NULL,
  `questionImage` text,
  `correctAnswer` text NOT NULL,
  `explanation` text,
  `tags` text,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `mistake_notebook_attempts` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `questionId` int NOT NULL,
  `studentId` int NOT NULL,
  `studentAnswer` text NOT NULL,
  `isCorrect` boolean NOT NULL,
  `errorType` varchar(100),
  `studentNotes` text,
  `reviewStatus` enum('pending', 'reviewed', 'mastered') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
  `reviewedAt` timestamp NULL,
  `timeSpent` int,
  `attemptedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `mistake_notebook_topics` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `studentId` int NOT NULL,
  `subject` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `topicName` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `totalQuestions` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `correctAnswers` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `errorRate` float NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `priority` enum('low', 'medium', 'high', 'critical') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'medium',
  `lastPracticed` timestamp NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  UNIQUE KEY `unique_topic` (`studentId`, `subject`, `topicName`)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `mistake_notebook_insights` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `studentId` int NOT NULL,
  `insightType` enum('pattern_analysis', 'study_suggestion', 'question_recommendation', 'progress_report') NOT NULL,
  `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `content` text NOT NULL,
  `data` text,
  `relevanceScore` float NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `isRead` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
  `isArchived` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
  `generatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `expiresAt` timestamp NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `mistake_notebook_study_plans` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `studentId` int NOT NULL,
  `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `description` text,
  `startDate` date NOT NULL,
  `endDate` date NOT NULL,
  `planData` text NOT NULL,
  `totalTasks` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `completedTasks` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `progressPercentage` float NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `status` enum('active', 'completed', 'abandoned') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'active',
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,

  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
